Nightstrike::

Nightstrike tried to avoid the bullets, he freed one of his wings and 
used it to cover him... "Haaaaa!!!"yelled with pain"You wuill regret 
it!!!!"

he tried to free his arms.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> "Argg!" He yelled as he was spat on.

opened
